findings.message:
Matrix.totalSupply (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#89) shadows:
	- ERC20.totalSupply (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#4)
findings.name: shadowing-abstract

findings.message:
Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#26-28) should emit an event for: 
	- owner = newOwner (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#27)
findings.name: events-access

findings.message: Modifier Ownable.onlyOwner() (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#21-24) does not always execute _; or revert
findings.name: incorrect-modifier

findings.message: SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#57-62) is never used and should be removed
findings.name: dead-code

findings.message: Matrix._transfer(address,address,uint256) (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#109-125) is never used and should be removed
findings.name: dead-code

findings.message: SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#45-52) is never used and should be removed
findings.name: dead-code

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.16 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder
	- ZeroFunctionSelector.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.16 (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message:
Matrix.Matrix() (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#94-100) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 100000000000000 * 10 ** uint256(decimals) (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#95)
findings.name: too-many-digits

findings.message: Matrix.version (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#87) should be constant
findings.name: constable-states

findings.message: Matrix.decimals (0x871a71438029549a836c042d3bd0e88ca6c88388.sol#86) should be constant
findings.name: constable-states

findings.message:

findings.name: external-function
